title: Welcome!
text:
This webpage contains community contributions for Fall 2023 EDAV class at Columbia University.
There are 108 videos in total that are divided into 7 categories.
Hopefully this will help you prepare for your final project!

title: Welcome!

This webpage contains community contributions for Fall 2023 EDAV class at Columbia University.
There are 108 videos in total that are divided into 7 categories.
Hopefully this will help you prepare for your final project!

title: Data Visualization Techniques
text:
Subcategory 1: Statistical and Quantitative Analysis
1. Exploring Categorical Datasets in R (Mon/Wed) 2. Quantile-Based Data Partitioning Methods in R with Cut2() (Mon/Wed) 3. Effective Data Comparison on Different Scales (Mon/Wed) 4. Subcategory 2: Plot Types and Techniques

Subcategory 4: Specialized Data Types Visualization
23. Using WordClouds to analyze data (Mon/Wed) 24. R Visualizations for Financial Data Analysis with Plotly (Mon/Wed) 25. NFL Visualizations with Next Gen Stats (Mon/Wed) 26. Interactive Visualization of Geospatial Data with GGplot2 and Plotly (Tues/Thurs) 29. How to use Geom_map in GGplot2 (Tues/Thurs) 30. Using R to visualize expense (Tues/Thurs) 31. Interactive Time Series Data Visualization with Dygraphs Package (Tues/Thurs) 35. Choropleth Maps in R (Tues/Thurs)

Effective color ramps (Tues/Thurs) 50. Creating 2D and 3D Visualizations with Rayshader (Tues/Thurs) 51. Customizing Themes in R with GGthemr (Tues/Thurs) 52. Plotting Waterfall Chart with R ggplot2 (Tues/Thurs) 53. TrelliscopeJS for Interactive Data Visualization (Tues/Thurs) 54. Correlation Matrices and Hierarchical Clustering in R (Tues/Thurs) 55.
